price: O oče moj, bojim se da te od Milostivog ne stigne kazna, pa da budeš šejtanu drug.”
arabic: يَٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يَمَسَّكَ عَذَابٞ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيۡطَٰنِ وَلِيّٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāabati innī akhāfu an yamassaka ʿadhābun mina al-raḥmāni fatakūna lilshayṭāni waliyyan
